net.kuujo.vertigo.rpc

Class AbstractExecutor<T extends Executor<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.vertigo.component.ComponentBase<T>
      • net.kuujo.vertigo.rpc.AbstractExecutor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The executor type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component<T>, Executor<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultPollingExecutor, DefaultStreamExecutor

    public abstract class AbstractExecutor<T extends Executor<T>>
extends ComponentBase<T>
implements Executor<T>
    An abstract executor implementation.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
